title: CoinCraddle.com
author: CoinCraddle.com
created_time: March 16, 2023, 11:07:07 PMLast edit: March 16, 2023, 11:17:20 PM by CoinCraddle.com
content: CoinCraddle.comThe best way to exchange your cryptocurrency.Our mission is to provide millions of users around the world with the ability to freely, anonymously, and most importantly, safely exchange their crypto assets in any volume. The platform is fully automated, allowing users to exchange 400 directions at the most favorable rate in just a few clicks.Over the years, we have identified the key elements that define a quality cryptocurrency exchange service.Security. We pay great attention to the security of our platform and promptly respond to any possible problems. We also conduct AML checks on all incoming funds, ensuring that your funds will not be blocked by the exchange. Funds from us come from verified liquidity providers, so we can guarantee their cleanliness by 100%.Technical support. Our technical support is ready to assist you 24/7, with response time of just 5 minutes!Number of cryptocurrency pairs. Today, there are a huge number of various directions that are popular with users. We have added 400 cryptocurrency pairs to our platform so that you can find what you need and exchange it at the best rate.Exchange rate. The most important element is the exchange rate provided by the exchange service. You can find the best rates for all cryptocurrency pairs on our platform.Well-designed website. Our team has done a tremendous amount of work on our website to ensure that you get even more enjoyment from the exchange process on our platform. Each step of the exchange has been designed so customers spend less time filling out the application.Anonymity. Registration is not required and you can make exchanges completely anonymously.Commission. Our commission is only 0.3% for the exchange, regardless of the volume you decide to change.Exchanging crypto-assets with us, you can get additional earnings due to elaborated cashback system and affiliate program.Start exchanging with us anonymously and with the best rates!We'll be glad to hear your suggestions and comments, which you can leave in this thread.Our contacts:Telegram:@coincraddleEmail: support@coincraddle.comWebsite: coincraddle.com

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: I guess you need to consider listing your site with Best_change. They list crypto exchanges like your ones.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: I think you need to work with the marketing team to write a good ANN topic or at least add an infographic.The site asks me to leave an evaluation, but isn't it better to leave the evaluation through a third party that you do not control?You have many positive reviews on trustpilot[1], but most of them were during the last three months.The maximum amount of bitcoins that can be transferred is 120 bitcoins, which is a lot to ask without KYC, how did you manage it?[1] https://www.trustpilot.com/review/coincraddle.com?page=2

comments.author: CoinCraddle.com
comments.body: Hello, Thank you for your feedback!  QuoteI think you need to work with the marketing team to write a good ANN topic or at least add an infographic. Yes, our marketing team is going to refine our ANN topic in near future. QuoteThe site asks me to leave an evaluation, but isn't it better to leave the evaluation through a third party that you do not control?I must clarify that we don't ask our customers to leave an evaluation on our website. What we ask is leaving review of our service on platforms where we are represented, so our customer can get a bonus. QuoteYou have many positive reviews on trustpilot[1], but most of them were during the last three months.Recently we started to give bonuses, so we can get a proper reviews of our website. Sometimes we also offer giveaways. And one of conditions to participating in it can be leaving a review of our service.QuoteThe maximum amount of bitcoins that can be transferred is 120 bitcoins, which is a lot to ask without KYC, how did you manage it?Not many customers are ready to exchange this amount of btc without contacting our support team. In such cases, we advise splitting the amount and exchanging it in several parts. But if the customer sends such amount, we are able to complete this order. All incoming transactions should pass AML system, and if it's ok, we execute an exchange without hesitation.QuoteI guess you need to consider listing your site with Best_change. They list crypto exchanges like your ones.Yep, this is one of the best platforms for such services as ours, and we are definitely considering listing on Best_change. But we would like to go further. For example, we almost complete our integration with SwapSpace.

comments.author: Best_Change
comments.body: Exchanger coincraddle.com has been added to our monitor BestChange.We have analyzed information about the service’s work, its reputation, principles, and values of its administration and came to the conclusion that Coincraddle.com satisfies the criteria for a reliable partner and can be listed in BestChange, among other exchangers.We sincerely hope for productive and long-term cooperation with this service. Despite the successful passing of all the checks, we will keep an eye on its reputation and the development of the client service.We recommend you always check the review page https://www.bestchange.com/coincraddle-exchanger.html . After an exchange, please share your opinion about the provided service with others.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Congratulations upon getting listed on BestChange exchanger monitor. I hope the partnership become fruitful for both parties.There's a typo on your title, the last part "no sing up" I guess you were trying to say "no sign up" or "no signing up"
